briefTitle: An Open-label, Long-term Study of Telmisartan Plus Amlodipine Fixed-dose Combination
officialTitle: An Open-label, Long-term Study of Telmisartan Plus Amlodipine Fixed-dose Combination
summary: To assess the long term safety and efficacy of telmisartan plus amlodipine FDC in patients with essential hypertension who failed to control their BP with either monotherapy

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Experienced Adverse Events

effectByArm.arm: Telmisartan 40 mg Plus Amlodipine 5 mg Fixed-dose Combination
Telmisartan 80 mg Plus Amlodipine 5 mg Fixed-dose Combination
